channel.title: Utf-8 on Jaigarage
channel.description: Recent content in Utf-8 on Jaigarage

item.title: No UTF-8 Locale Fix
item.description: Locales define the language, country, and character encoding settings for your system. UTF-8 is a variable-width character encoding that can represent every character in the Unicode character set, making it essential for displaying international characters and ensuring proper text handling in modern Linux environments.
